name: 离校日 The School Leaving Day
name_original: 离校日 The School Leaving Day
description:
Introduction

Thank you for your attention to The School Leaving Day! At this stage, the game is still under development and is expected to be launched in July 2020!

This game is a 3D Puzzle shooting game, which contains some thriller scenes and RPG elements;

You will play a young man trapped in a mysterious school and temporarily lost his memory in the game. You will find your memory and discover the truth of the fact while escaping from the school;

The map scene in the game is based on the real school, you can enjoy exploring in the junior high school with Chinese local characteristics;

Most of the work in the development process of this work is completed by the producer alone, and has been developed for 2 years；

This work is based on the author's personal experience, integrates a lot of realistic elements, and adapts reasonably on the basis of real events, but the names of people and places involved in the game have nothing to do with reality;



Game characteristics

Try and buy this work, you will get the following experience:

+Escape process with slight horror and psychological terror

+Use props and scenes to solve puzzles

+First person shooting with props

+Boss war with different styles

+A complete story with multiple endings

+Rich props and equipment system

Thank you for your support！
